name: Marketbasket
tagline: Market Basket Analysis Macro: The “Poor Man’s Recommendation Engine”
body:
### Welcome to market basket.
Market basket analysis is a common mathematical technique used by marketing professionals to reveal affinities between individual products or product groupings. [Clario Analytics](http://clarioanalytics.com) has prepared an open source SAS Market Basket Analysis Macro and made it available for [download](https://github.com/clarioanalytics/marketbasket/zipball/master). The macro was the basis for a paper presented during the SAS Users International Group in 2003.

Contributions are welcome; feel free to [fork](https://github.com/clarioanalytics/marketbasket) and get started.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
